In this new documentary for ITV, detectives hunt an elusive major criminal who has hijacked the credit card accounts and identities of hundreds of British victims.

Whether they portray themselves on the phone to be a banking institution or some other corporate organisation, whatever they need to be they will be in order to commit fraud.â€ â€“ Det. Chief Supt. David Clark, the City Of London Police.
 
In this new documentary for ITV, detectives hunt an elusive major criminal who has hijacked the credit card accounts and identities of hundreds of British victims.
 
Dubbed by detectives as â€˜Mr Poshâ€™, he is a master of disguise and accents. Every day he telephones the banks posing as different customers, impersonating everyone from a female pensioner to an Asian businessman. Heâ€™s tricked the banks and traumatised his victims, stealing tens of thousands of pounds a day
